import os
from pathlib import Path

from dotenv import load_dotenv

load_dotenv()

[docs]LIBRARY_LOCATION = ROOT_DIRECTORY / Path("src")


[docs]QUERIES_LOCATION = LIBRARY_LOCATION / Path("pipeline/queries")


[docs]TEST_DATA_LOCATION = ROOT_DIRECTORY / Path("tests/test_data")
